Instant car rental with hourly rate.
Share car sewa mobil lepas kunci yang te: Share car rental cars loose keys in Jakarta, Bekasi, Tangerang & Depok. With duration starting from 1 hour to 72 hours flexible share car for various needs. From office affairs to family vacations, Share Cars are ready to be a mainstay.
Aplikasi sewa mobil self drive hitungan: Hourly car renting app. Rent duration can range from 1 to 72 hours. Download the Share Car app in playstore(android) and AppStore (iOS)
Dimana Kami Bisa Menemukan Kendaraan Sha: Where can I find Share Car?
Share Car dapat diakses di gedung-gedung: Share Car can be found in office buildings, shopping malls and apartments across Jakarta and Bali. Share Car continues to expand and provide you with ease and comfort. Check the full list of locations here.
Kapan waktu operasional Share Car?: What is Share Car's operating hours?
Share Car bisa digunakan setiap hari 24/: Share Car can be used everyday 24/7.
Bagaimana cara mendaftar menjadi member?: How do I become a Share Car member?
Download aplikasi Share Car dan klik reg: Download the Share Car application and click registration. Enter personal data and register your credit card. Only Indonesian citizens who already have an ID card and driving license can register as members.
Apakah ada biaya pendaftaran member?: Is there a Sign Up Fee?
Tidak ada. Pendaftaran di aplikasi Share: No, Share Car registration is free of charge.
Berapa lama verifikasi akun member ?: How long will account verification take?
Akun Anda akan diverifikasi dalam waktu: Your account will be verified within 24 hours from registration
Apakah bisa mendaftar dengan lisensi asi: Can I Sign Up with an Foreign Driver's License
Bisa. Saat ini Warga Negara Asing dapat: Yes, Foreign Citiizens can register and use Share Car
Berapa biaya sewa kendaraan Share Car pe: What is Share Car's hourly rate?
Pricing starts from Rp. 27,000/ hour. Different prices may be applied depending vehicle type.
Biaya sewa Share Car mencakup apa saja?: What is included in Share Car's rate?
Asuransi dan biaya parkir di lokasi peng: Share Car rate includes rent prices, insurance and parking fees at pick-up location
Pembayaran menggunakan kartu kredit yang: Payment using a credit card that has been registered in your account.
Bagaimana cara reservasi kendaraan?: How do I book Share Car?
Reservasi kendaraan bisa dilakukan di da: Car reservations can be made in the Share Car application. Choose a location and/or list of available cars, click book and you can use the car right away. A confirmation via email will be sent to you if the reservation is successful. Make sure to “unlock” the car before 15 minutes after you make your booking
Apakah bisa reservasi kendaraan beberapa: Can I book Share Car a few days in advance?
Tidak bisa. Share Car hanya bisa digunak: No. Share Car can only be used for immediate bookings at this time.
Apakah Share Car bisa digunakan untuk pe: Can I use Share Car to different cities?
Saat ini Share Car bisa digunakan untuk: Currently, Share Cars can be used for trips outside the city, but are still limited to the Bandung area.
Bagaimana cara mengambil kendaraan setel: How to pick up the car after reservation?
Ambil kendaraan di lokasi parkir yang su: Pick up the car at the designated parking location. Open your Share Car app. Click the unlock symbol to unlock the car. Now you are ready to drive with Share Car. Almost all Share Car vehicles are equipped with a “start button”, and do not require a key to start the car.
Bagaimana cara mengembalikan kendaraan?: How do I return my Share Car?
Ketika perjalanan Anda berakhir, kembali: When your trip ends, return the vehicle to the same location and parking space when it was picked up. Before locking the car, check and make sure no personal items are left behind.
Bagaimana cara membuka/ mengunci kendara: How do I lock/unlock my Share Car
Klik simbol gembok untuk buka/ kunci ken: Click the lock symbol to lock/unlock your Share Car through the app.
Bagaimana metode pembayaran Share Car?: What is Share Car's payment method?
Share Car hanya menerima pembayaran mela: Share Car only accepts payment through Credit Card.
Apakah ada metode pembayaran selain kart: Are there any other payment methods?
Tidak ada. Saat ini metode pembayaran ya: No,currently Credit Card is the only payment method accepted
Saya sudah mendaftarkan kartu kredit, te: I registered my credit card, but why are there error messages?
Pastikan data kartu kredit yang kamu mas: Ensure that the credit card you registered is correct. Share Car does not accept Online Debit cards like Jenius and other cards alike, You can contact our CS team via Whatsapp at +62 812-9555-5927.
Bagaimana cara pendaftaran kartu kredit: How do I input my credit card in the App?
Buka aplikasi Share Car \n Masukkan nam:
Open the Share Car app 
  Enter the full name according to the name on your credit card. 
 Enter the month and year of expiration and the CVV number. 
 Click “submit”
Bagaimana cara memperbarui dan mengubah: How do I update my credit card information?
Buka aplikasi Share Car \n Masuk menggun:
Open the Share Car app 
 Log in using the registered account 
 Press the 3 (three) line symbol in the upper left corner 
 Select settings 
 Select change card details 
 Press switch button 
 Fill in your credit card data 
 Click the submit button when you are done.
Bolehkah saya reservasi kendaraan Share: May I book Share Car for someone else?
Tidak, hanya Anggota yang memesan kendar: No, only the person who booked the car can use Share Car. Breaching Share Car's Terms & Conditions can lead to your account being suspended.
Anda dapat membatalkan pemesanan kendara: You can cancel reservations before starting your trip with Share Car
Apakah boleh merokok saat menggunakan ke: Is smoking allowed in the car?
Anda dilarang merokok di dalam kendaraan: Smoking is not allowed in Share Car's vehicles. You will be fined for smoking in the car.
Bisakah saya menggunakan jasa valet untu: Can I use Valet Service to park the car?
Tidak bisa. Karena hanya Anda yang memil: No, because locking/unlocking of the car can only be done through the app
Bagaimana jika bahan bakar kendaraan hab: What happens if the car is low on fuel?
Member Share Car wajib mengembalikan ken: Share Car members must return vehicles with the same level of fuel as to when the vehicle was first picked up. If there is a difference in fuel level upon returning the car, then you will be charged with the difference in fuel level at Rp. 13.000,-/ litre (price before tax)
Bagaimana cara untuk membuka Akun saya y: How do I unlock my locked account?
Anda dapat menghubungi Team Share Car un: You can contact us to unlock your account. You will need to change your password by clicking the forgot password button in your app
anggota setuju untuk terikat oleh persya: Member agrees to be bound by the following membership terms and conditions:
Dalam perjanjian ini digunakan beberapa: In this agreement several terms are used, “Manual Book”  means the Member's handbook can be changed at any time by Share Car which is an integral part of this agreement. “Member”  means an applicant who has registered and has been verified by Share Car. “Vehicles: means motorized vehicles leased to Members by Share Car under this agreement. “Share Car” is a business unit of PT Adi Sarana Armada Tbk.
Anggota wajib melakukan pengisian form r: Members are required to fill out the registration form with information and personal data of the Member which can be guaranteed & validated for by the Member.
Anggota berusia minimal 21 tahun, memili: Members are at least 21 years old, have a SIM that has been active for at least 1 year and still valid for at least 1 month before expired.
Anggota wajib melakukan pembaruan SIM A: Members are required to renew driving license on Share Car application or portal before expires.
Anggota hanya diperbolehkan memiliki sat: Members are only allowed to have one account registered in Share Car.
Anggota menyatakan bahwa memiliki kapasi: Member certify that they have the mental and physical capacity to drive a car competently, safely and are willing to comply with applicable traffic regulations.
Pemegang SIM A yang sudah kadaluwarsa, d: The holder of a driving license that has expired, been suspended, canceled, lost or stolen, doesn’t meet the requirements to become a Member and also doesn’t meet the requirements for insurance coverage and is responsible for penalties that may be imposed by the relevant authorities.
Anggota mengetahui, memahami dan menyetu: Members acknowledge, understand and agree that by fulfilling the requirements specified by Share Car, they do not automatically become Share Car Member. Approval to become a Share Car Member is entirely Share Car decision. Decision regarding your membership status will be informed via electronic mail.
Share Car berhak menolak keanggotaan ata: Share Car has the right to refuse membership or stop Share Car services to Member at any time if a Member is found to have the potential to harm Share Car and Share Car is not required to explain the reason for stopping services and/or revoking your membership.
Anggota harus mengendarai dan menggunaka: Member must drive and use the vehicle properly and safely, comply with applicable traffic regulations and not drive the vehicle beyond the geographical area boundaries determined by Share Car. Share Car usage area boundaries include: Jabodetabek - Merak Harbor, Semarang. Bali - Island of Bali.
Anggota tidak diperbolehkan melakukan pe: Members are not allowed to make booking for other people. If the Member violates it, Share Car has the right to terminate or deactivate the Member's Share Car account and Member will be fined according to the applicable Share Car regulations.
Anggota tidak diperbolehkan menggunakan: Members are not allowed to use Share Car for learn to drive or teach others to learn to drive a car.
Anggota bertanggung jawab sepenuhnya ata: Members are fully responsible for all costs (including vehicle repair costs or vehicle compensation) arising from violating the articles stated in these terms and conditions.
Anggota tidak diperbolehkan menggunakan: Members are not allowed to use Share Car for rental / lease back to others, online taxis, offline taxis, transportation services or other rentals.
Members are not allowed to use Share Car to carry alcohol, drugs, firearms or other similar dangerous goods.
Anggota bertanggung jawab atas STNK kend: Members are responsible for vehicle registration, car keys (especially for cars that have not used a “push button”) and parking card during booking period. If there is a loss, Member will responsible for the cost that appear.
Share Car berhak mengambil alih atau men: Share Car has the right to take over or disable the vehicle that will be or is being used by Member if Share Car believes that the Member has a risk of misusing the vehicle.
Share Car berhak mengambil gambar atau v: Share Car has the right to take pictures or videos on the vehicle through a surveillance camera that will be used for the security purpose of Members and vehicles.
Durasi sewa Share Car maksimal 2 hari. A: Maximum duration of Share Car rental is 2 days. If a Member wants to rent for more than 2 days, the Member must confirm in advance with Share Car. If not, then the Member will be fined with an amount according to what has been regulated in these terms and conditions.
Anggota harus memeriksa eksterior dan in: Member must check the exterior and interior of the vehicle, check the fuel level and vehicle kilometers and take photos of the car dashboard before and after using the vehicle.
Jika pada saat pengecekan, Anggota menem: If at the time of checking, the Member find damages, defects or dirty condition of the vehicle, Member must report it to Share Car by using the features available in the application before and after using the vehicle. If there is no report, it is assumed that the vehicle is in good condition and free from damage and if damage is found in the future, Member will responsible for the cost of the damage.
Jika kerusakan ditemukan setelah perjala: If damage is found after the trip and the Member cannot provide photos or evidence showing that this happened not during the Member's trip, the Member must be responsible for repair cost and/or insurance cost for the vehicle.
Semua kendaraan termasuk semua aksesori,: All vehicles including all accessories, tools, spare tire keys, documents (vehicle registration, parking card, etc.) and other supporting equipment are the property of Share Car and Members are not allowed to release, move, exchange, modify and take these accessories.
Anggota tidak diperbolehkan dan tidak be: Members are not allowed and have no right to mortgage or pledge Share Car vehicles or transfer ownership of Share Car vehicle to other people.
Anggota wajib mengembalikan kendaraan se: Members are required to return the vehicle according to the initial location at the time of booking.

Members are required to return the vehicle before reaching the maximum rental duration. If not, the Member will be charged a late fee in accordance with the amount specified in these terms and conditions.
Jika kendaraan dikembalikan dalam kondis: If the vehicle returned in an unsatisfactory condition and requires repair or cleaning work in addition to routine maintenance, Member must responsible for the cost of such repairs.
pengembalian-kendaraan-4: Member are required to ensure that the car door & window are tightly closed and all electronic/engine/electrical functions are turned off when the vehicle is returned. If not, the member will be fine in accordance with the applicable regulation in this agreement.
Tarif sewa kendaraan yang berlaku dapat: The applicable vehicle rental rates can be found when the Member booking a vehicle or after using the vehicle. Rental rates are calculated based on the duration of the rental.
Anggota setuju untuk melakukan pembayara: Member agree to make full payment for the rental vehicle that has been used, including all types of additional cost / fine that may arise as a result of the Member's mistake when using Share Car.
Pembayaran dapat dilakukan melalui kartu: Payment can be made via credit card and/or other forms of payment arranged by Share Car.
Data informasi kartu kredit Anggota yang: Member's credit card information that has been registered in the application is confidential.
Biaya pemakaian kendaraan yang dikenakan: The fee for using the vehicle that is charged include tax is in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations.
Anggota harus memastikan kartu kredit ya: Member must ensure that the credit card registered in application is a valid credit card.
Jika Anggota melakukan pembatalan pemesa: If Member cancel an order shortly after the car key is opened, then the 1 hour vehicle rental fee will be charged to Member's credit card.
Apabila terjadi hal yang memerlukan peng: If something happens that require a refund on the Member's account, Share Car need 7 to 14 working days to process the refund.
Pengembalian biaya dapat berupa voucher: Refunds can be in the form of Share Car voucher or it can be refund to the balance on the Member's credit card depending on the case.
Share Car menetapkan denda dan biaya tam: Share Car determine fines and additional fees (not including VAT) for violation committed by Member and Member are required to make full payment with detail and amount as follow :
Anggota akan dikenakan dendan Rp.100.000: Member will be fined Rp.100.000 / hour if Member return the vehicle exceed rental maximum duration that has been determined by Share Car
Merokok di dalam kendaraan, denda sebesa: Smoking in the vehicle, a fine of Rp.500.000
Megangkut hewan peliharaan di dalam kend: Transporting pet in the vehicle, a fine of Rp.100.000
Mengembalikan kendaraan di akhir perjala: Returning the vehicle at the end of the Member's trip to a location that doesn’t match Share Car location / initial location, a fine of Rp.100.000
Mengembalikan kendaraan dalam keadaan ko: Returning the vehicle in a dirty and smelly condition, including leaving trash in the vehicle, a fine of Rp.100.000
Mengembalikan kendaraan dengan jendela p: Returning the vehicle with the windows open, a fine of Rp.200.000
Menggunakan Share Car untuk tindakan kri: Using Share Car for criminal acts / crimes that harm Share Car or other parties, a fine of Rp.5.000.000
Menggunakan Share Car untuk atau dengan: Using a Share Car for or with carrying liquor, firearms, narcotics and/or other dangerous objects, a fine of Rp.5.000.000
Menghilangkan kunci kendaraan (kendaraan: Vehicle registration lost, a fine of Rp.1.500.000
Menghilangkan STNK kendaraan, denda sebe: Vehicle is not driven by the Member who made the booking, a fine of Rp.500.000
Kendaraan tidak dikemudikan oleh Anggota: Using a Share Car for online taxi needs, offline taxis or other similar services, a fine of Rp.500.000
Menghilangkan kartu/karcis parkir pada l: Lost parking card/ticket of Share Car parking location, a fine of Rp.200.000
Mengembalikan kendaraan diakhir pemesana: Returning the vehicle at the end of the trip with a fuel level less than the initial fuel level before the Member start booking, Member will be charged an additional fuel fee of Rp.13.000 / liter
Pelanggaran lalu lintas dan parkir yang: Traffic and parking violation that result in fine and/or Vehicle must be detained/towed, and cannot be used by other Member, the amount of the fine will be based on the amount of the ticket/violation fee plus administrative fee
Anggota terlibat dalam insiden / kecelak: Members involved in an accident while using Share Car vehicle, be it intentional or unintentionally (including collision or misuse of our vehicle), will immediately incur Administrative and Repair Fees, based on the severity of the damage subjected to our vehicle:
Kerusakan ringan : mencakup namun tidak: Minor Damage: includes but not limited to damages on the very top layer of vehicle coating with depth of max. 0,5 cm or not exposing the plastic or metal layers underneath the paint. Length of damage a maximum of 5 cm or damage only subjected to 1 vehicle panel which can be a form of hairline scratches or light scuffs and not resulting the vehicle to be inoperable, and the repair duration is estimated between 1 - 3 working days. Members immediately charged Rp. 1.000.000, on Credit Card or Other Payment Methods.
Kerusakan sedang : mencakup namun tidak: Moderate Damage: includes but not limited to damages on the top layer of vehicle coating with depth more than 0,5 cm or exposing the plastic or metal layers underneath the paint. Length of damage between 5 - 10 cm or damage subjected to 2-3 vehicle panels which can be a form of deep scratches, small dents and not resulting the vehicle to be inoperable, and the repair duration is estimated between 4 - 7 working days. Members immediately charged Rp. 3.000.000, on Credit Card or Other Payment Methods.
Kerusakan berat : mencakup namun tidak t: Heavy Damage and/or TLA (Total Lost Accident): includes but not limited to damages exposing the plastic or metal layers underneath the paint and length of damage more than 10 cm or damage subjected to more than 3 vehicle panels and also includes exposed airbags, causing the vehicle to be unroadworthy and inoperable or wrecked up to 20% of body and the repair duration is estimated more than 7 working days. Members immediately charged Rp. 5.000.000, on Credit Card or Other Payment Methods.
Kerusakan sangat berat dan/atau TLA (Tot: Very serious damage and/or TLA (Total Lost Accident) : include but not limited to open airbags, bent chassis, unfit for driving, vehicle body damage up to 20% and the vehicle must stop operating with a repair time more than 12 days, a fine of Rp.5.000.000
denda-dan-biaya-tambahan-1-17: Share Car vehicles must only be driven and operated by registered Member who has successfully made the booking. Violation of this rule that results in a car accident will immediately incur an additional charge of Rp. 1.000.000 on top of repair fees (excluding Damage and Repair Fees) on Credit Card or Other Payment Methods
denda-dan-biaya-tambahan-1-18: Returning the vehicle with electronic/engine/electrical on, a fine of Rp.100.000.
Pembayaran denda dan biaya tambahan ini: Payment of fine and additional cost is automatically debited from the Member's credit card. Until all fines are paid, Member can’t use Share Car.
Share Car berhak melakukan penagihan bia: Share Car has the right to collect additional cost if in the future it is found that the damage to the vehicle that has occurred is stated to be more severe than the initial estimate damage that has been notified to Member.
Anggota dengan ini juga membebaskan Shar: Member hereby also release Share Car from all accusations that occur as a result of the Member's mistake, whether intentional or unintentional when using Share Car which violate the applicable laws in Indonesia.
Pembayaran denda oleh Anggota dilakuan d: Payment by Member is carried out by using a credit card or debit card or other forms of payment determined by Share Car. Member have to ensure credit card and/or debit card have sufficient fund or credit to pay bills arising from the use of Share Car. Member is fully responsible for any associated bank or credit card fee or charge. Member may be charged a processing fee for declined credit card or debit card payment.
Keadaan yang dirujuk pada pasal sebelumn: The circumstance referred to previous article where Share Car may apply for fines against Member for losses that arising during Member's rental period are damages as a result of or in connection with: (a) Member's breach the applicable contract; (b) Member's unlawful activity; (c) Accident ; (d) False report submitted by Member regarding accident report, insurance claim or police report; (e) Intentional damage; (f) Using the Share Car for inappropriate activities (e.g : transporting food, flammable materials, illegal drugs, firearms / sharp tools, using vehicle for commercial purpose); (g) Book Share Car for other people.
Jika ada pembayaran yang masih belum ter: If there is a payment that still outstanding, Share Car has the right to prohibit Member from making further booking until all outstanding fees in the Member's account have been fully paid.
Anggota setuju untuk membayar biaya-biay: Member agree to pay the fee specified in the agreement, including specifically and without the limitations stated in these terms. Other cost that have not been listed in this agreement and will be applied on Share Car will be communicated to Member.
Pelaporan barang tertinggal melalui Call: Reporting left / lost item via Call Center 1500-369, Whatsapp +62 81295555927 or email info@sharecar.co.id.
Share car tidak bertanggung jawab atas p: Share car is not responsible  for the item left behind or damaged after the Member's trip is over.
Share Car akan menyimpan barang yang ter: Share Car will store leftover item for a maximum of 14 days from the Member's booking date.
Khusus untuk barang yang mudah rusak (se: Perishable goods (such as food/drink) will be discarded after 24 hours.
Share Car hanya menyediakan layanan peng: Share Car only provide item pick-up services from Monday - Friday according to operating hours 09:00 - 16:00. Members must show their ID Card, email & phone number registered in Share Car application for the pick-up process.
Share Car tidak menyediakan layanan peng: Share Car doesn’t provide goods delivery services to Member location.
Anggota dapat melakukan penghapusan akun: Members can delete account through the profile menu in Share Car application.
Anggota tidak dapat melakukan penghapusa: Member can’t delete their account if Member still has unpaid bill in Share Car.
Anggota yang melakukan penghapusan akun: Member who delete Share Car account, all personal data and other detailed data will be permanently deleted from Share Car system. Member can no longer access all data, information, features and services of Share Car, including opening, reactivating or restoring Member's Share Car account.
Perjanjian ini akan berakhir jika Anggot: This agreement will terminate if Member is deactivated as a result of breach of any of his obligations under this agreement or if the Member ceases to be a Share Car Member.
Perjanjian ini akan terus berlaku selama: This Agreement will continue to apply as long as the Member is still registered in Share Car Membership.
Pengakhiran persetujuan ini tidak akan m: Termination of this agreement will not harm or in any way affect the rights and authority of Share Car based on the terms herein in connection with violation that have been committed by Member.
kembalikan kendaraan dengan level BBM ya: Return the vehicle with the same fuel level as at the time of collection

share Car merupakan bagian dari PT Adi S: Share Car is a part of PT Adi Sarana Armada Tbk (hereinafter referred to as We). We respect to the privacy rights of our user. This privacy policy describes personal information we collect and how we use it. This privacy policy includes collection and the use of information when you use Share Car website and/or application, when you join Share Car and use our services. This privacy policy does not apply to other websites or Internet or mobile application accessed through our site. By submitting your personal information to us and accepting privacy policy, you agree to the use of Share Car and disclosure of your personal information as contained in this privacy notice. This privacy notice is incorporated into, and part of, Contract of Terms & Conditions of Share Car Member usage.
Informasi yang Kami Kumpulkan, Terima da: INFORMATION THAT WE COLLECT, ACCEPT AND MANAGE
Informasi pribadi Anda yang kami kumpulk:
Your personal information that we collect includes but is not limited to the name, email address, postal address, phone number, your image or other document identification, and order history. We also collect non-personal information including but not limited to IP address, browser type operating system, browser language and your service provider, data related to other general Internet usage, GPS data and other tracking data.
 
 We collect your personal information for the purpose of processing your application, enabling you to order and use our vehicle, payment and to improve our products, marketing promo strategy and services.
Apabila Anda sudah membuat akun dan tela: If you have made an account and registered as our member, you may access, correct or delete your information. You are responsible for maintaining confidentiality and ensuring that Login access and password are only used by you.
seluruh Informasi Yang Terkumpul Dilindu: All information collected is protected by reasonable means and security procedures to prevent unauthorized access to and use of data. Our partners and third-party service providers have committed to managing information in accordance with our terms of equality and privacy in accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations of the Republic of Indonesia.
share Car Dapat Menggunakan Cookies Untu: Share Car may use cookies to store information about member preference and setting on a computer, mobile phone or other user device to make site usage easier for user or for third party needs in advertising or data analysis.
situs Kami Dapat Menyediakan Tautan Menu: Our website may provide links to other website or other application. If you submit personal information to such sites, your information is governed by their privacy policy and is not entirely our responsibility.
kami Dapat Memperbaharui Kebijakan Priva: We may update this privacy policy at any time and you are advised to check this page from time to time. By continuing to use our website and services, you confirm your consent to continue the use of the Service for any updates to this Privacy Policy.
penting Bagi Anda Meluangkan Waktu Untuk: It is important that you take the time to read, understand and accept the terms of this privacy policy. If you have any questions about handling our personal information, you can write us e-mail at
Kebijakan Privasi Ini Terakhir Kali Dipe: This Privacy Policy is last updated on August 21, 2018.
dengan melakukan penghapusan akun Share: By deleting Your Share Car Account, all personal data and any others data connected to Your Account will be permanently deleted from Share Car system. You can no longer access any data, information, features and Share Car services, including re-open, re-activating or restore your Account.
setelah menghapus Akun Anda, Anda juga t: After deleting Your Account, You can no longer re-register in Share Car Application using the same data information.
lain-lain-1: Through this agreement, Member agree to release Share Car from all claims or lawsuits that occur as a result of Member mistake, whether intentionally or un-intentionally when using Share Car.
